content.text:
House of the Rising Sun - The Animals 

Tab by Nathan Lambert, based on the tab by Chayes.

I made the tab more compact so I could see the lyrics better, but I left the
intro chords as an example of the picking pattern. The *'s are where you should
be keeping time somehow! In the comments section of another tab, some people said
they were having trouble with the "extra" notes, so I put those in parentheses ().
Playing them does sound more like the song, but people probably won't notice if
you leave them out ;)  I also fixed how the chords lined up with the lyrics to
something that makes more sense to me. Hope this helps someone. Cheers!

Standard tuning
No capo

content.text:
Several versions of this posted, hundreds of comments (some of which are unpleasant), many of which are 
stupid or just wrong!
I'm not an expert on green day, I'm not even a great guitarist but I don't think this song is as complicated
as people are making it. The only slightly odd thing is the Csus2. Of course I could be wrong.
Have some fun with it, I play it in open chords, but if you'd rather use bar chords or power chords..... 
If you can't be bothered with the Csus2 (shown below) just play a C, it'll sound fine
Anyway, let me know what you think

Standard tuning

[ch]E[/ch] X  [ch]Csus2[/ch]
A 3
D 0
G 0
B 1
e 3
